CustomField.description: This version of the Has Problem field is updated automatically by a workflow that copies the value from the formula version of the same field. That lets it be accessed from a rollup summary in Advisor Term.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This version of the Has Problem field is updated automatically by a workflow that copies the value from the formula version of the same field. That lets it be accessed from a rollup summary in Advisor Term.
CustomField.label: Has problem (non-formula)
